channel.title: Jpa on 好久不见

item.title: Spring.JPA.Fetch
item.description: [TOC] Setting Default Type Setting JPA 2.0 spec OneToMany Lazy ManyToMany Lazy OneToOne Eager ManyToOne Eager Hibernate * Lazy Docs Hibernate By default, Hibernate uses lazy select fetching for collections and lazy proxy fetching for single-valued associations. These defaults make sense for most associations in the majority of applications. Jpa Spec JPA Spec assumes that in general most of the applications will require the singleton relations by default be eager,
